Debt and Debt Service Reduction Loan

repnme.cdata!:
Uruguay - Debt and Debt Service Reduction
            Program Project

abstracts.cdata!:
This Debt and Debt Service Reduction
            Project presents an assessment of Uruguay's economic
            adjustment efforts, appraises its medium-term economic
            program and external financing plan, and describes and
            evaluates the debt and debt service reduction (DDSR)
            agreement. The DDSR agreement was reached in late 1990
            between Uruguay and its commercial bank creditors and was
            implemented in February 1991. The report : 1) reviews the
            background to recent economic developments, the severity of
            the debt burden, and the adjustment policies pursued in 1990
            and 1991; 2) evaluates the DDSR agreement in terms of a
            financial analysis of its instruments and the impact of the
            agreement on Uruguay's external financing and
            development prospects; and 3) contains a summary of country
            assistance strategy and Bank operations.
